ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | div1d.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |

| 3 |  | divmuld.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |

| 5 |  | #P_divmul | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ C e. CC /\ ( B e. CC /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( ( A / B ) = C <-> ( B x. C ) = A ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 3, 2, 4, 5 | #P_syl112anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) = C <-> ( B x. C ) = A ) ) |
